data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=3Yf617GZrJIQ7kNvgG8lPNp&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAi13yVFPzSg-vQvJabIHkkLtL08U888gQ_b-521xi_sg&oe=6693B71C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=4zApeAc4ZRIQ7kNvgEU1P3O&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB_rAYjjRFd47L1koEWe1mJOWZyUW9qYaoeCgycVtz1bQ&oe=6693C0A4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=2sFZBLAGnd4Q7kNvgFdE5hL&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCeri7LH2J5J2wMxt5qVNg3-zZhfpHUgPeB5fR6JHDiLw&oe=6693A807)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=QqMTGIr_ArkQ7kNvgFvkJPM&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCjlKXadLLFSDmF-5yXfc-H5VYK-Ld_7k1KBOa9AcGOng&oe=66939AE6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=0S-5YW_ZAm4Q7kNvgFzqIAs&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDE2RPWJssXfv7vD9EUOMWHJc5Ac-6cRDtTAStNC3-5Pg&oe=6693C758)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=8dzpbL0-gZsQ7kNvgFCLs75&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBnbdLOtOIOAJOpjWrqJX-K_NQOPobrPGyH4QEn4bGuCA&oe=6693C3D9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=JPH4B1ROlNUQ7kNvgFToBgw&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBLKt-GHtT0a-DwERKHpyE8UwpiLFXTKqiFDCJ0v6rcQw&oe=6693A9F0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=0iR8d8ioOLAQ7kNvgFzUp9S&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB8o31Hjd_DikhTTH7n9cb-G5SEtL2m0nG9MmkNMqNcXQ&oe=6693946A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=m-W-qIJ-DgkQ7kNvgGFdfAc&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBiRvHC5NWxE8_Eb8pE1oFKruT8yULRD0W3pGEngmZgEg&oe=6693A817)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=sVnslAjJ7dcQ7kNvgF2PDwg&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDINACs0n9_7bvBcY0WNhru8fN18swzOucYTB4Txu-01Q&oe=6693C38C)
